contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Wortegem-Petegem |picture= |picture-legend= |map=Wortegem-PetegemLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Wortegem-Petegem in East Flanders |arms=Wortegem-Petegemwapen.jpg |flag=Flag of Wortegem-Petegem.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-OV}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Oudenaarde|Oudenaarde]] |nis=45061 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor= Johan Delmulle (W.P.Z000) |majority=[[OpenVLD]], [[Christen-Democratisch en Vlaams|CD&V]] |postal-codes=9790 |telephone-area=055 |web=[http://www.wortegem-petegem.be/ www.wortegem-petegem.be] |lat_deg=50 |lat_min=51 |lon_deg=03 |lon_min=30 }} '''Wortegem-Petegem''' is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[East Flanders]]. The municipality comprises the villages of [[Elsegem]], [[Moregem]], [[Ooike]], [[Petegem]], and [[Wortegem]]. On January 1, 2006 Wortegem-Petegem had a total population of 5,977. The total area is 41.96 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 142 inhabitants per km². ==Villages== [[Elsegem]], [[Moregem]], [[Ooike]], [[Petegem]] en [[Wortegem]]. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.wortegem-petegem.be Official website of the municipality] {{East_Flanders}} [[Category:Municipalities of East Flanders]] [[Category:Wortegem-Petegem]] {{EastFlanders-geo-stub}}
